meanings.definition: An antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed lincomycin to cure the infection.
meanings.sent2: I took lincomycin to help me get better.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were no match for the mighty lincomycin!
meanings.sent4: Lincomycin acted like a superhero fighting off the bacterial villains.
meanings.sent5: The powerful lincomycin wiped out the bacteria completely.

meanings.definition: The chemical compound that lincomycin is derived from.
meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the structure of lincomycin to understand its composition.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician analyzed the lincomycin compound under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The lincomycin compound seemed to have a secret formula hidden within.
meanings.sent4: The lincomycin compound was like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The complex lincomycin compound fascinated researchers with its intricacies.
